description: This is a test source file for the Student model class. It contains unit tests verifying the creation, properties, mapping, copying, and handling of the Student data model in a Flutter project.

classes.name: Student
classes.description: A data model class representing a student in the kindergarten management system.

methods.name: fullName
methods.description: Returns the full name of the student by combining first and last names.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Converts the Student instance into a Map representation, suitable for serialization.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Creates a Student instance from a Map, typically deserialized data.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Student with optional new values for specified fields.
